articles.title: Coronavirus: school outbreak study ties spread to teachers - The Mercury News
articles.description: Amid debate over reopening public schools, a new federal study indicated that when there were outbreaks on campus, they were chiefly driven by infected teachers.
articles.content: Amid debate over reopening public schools closed for almost a year by the coronavirus pandemic, a new federal study Monday indicated that when there were outbreaks on campus, they were chiefly driven… [+4890 chars]
